video_title: The responsibility of a man with his wife is bigger than any responsibility, that is because of a Hadith that we have - Abu Hurairah narrated that The Messenger of Allah said: “The most complete of the believers in faith, is the one with the best character among them. And the best of you are those who are best to your women.” So the best men are those who are the best to their women. Quality over quantity is very important, it is not how much he gives you anything but how he gives you. ✨
